content: The Runit Dome is a concrete structure at Runit Island (Enewetak Atoll) in the Pacific Marshall Islands. The 18 inch thick dome was built to seal in nuclear waste from atomic testing, but there is evidence that it’s failing as sea levels rise. The domed previously volcanic crater was not lined as this was intended as a temporary solution…in 1977.__no.0427, 2020.  #PacificOcean #risingwaters
